Uses of Interface
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.AssembledReadBuilder

  • Packages that use AssembledReadBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly
    The assembly package contains objects for working with genomic data that has been assembled into Contigs and Scaffolds.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca.asm
    Contains Classes and interfaces to work with Celera Assembler data.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.ace
    This package contains classes for handling Contigs stored in the Ace File Format.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.contig
    This package contains classes that can read and write TIGR .contig formatted contig data (also known as .ctg format).
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.tasm
    This package contains classes to handle TIGR Assembler formatted assembly files.
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.assembly

      Change the gapped start offset of this read by shifting it to the given number of gapped bases.

      Trim this read to only contain the sequence of the given gapped range.
